    • Uses of Light in fast3d.complex.light

      Classes in fast3d.complex.light that implement Light 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AmbientLight
      ambient light means background-light or the minimum light that is even in the shadows
      class  DirectionalLight
      a directional light just works as sunlight on earth
      class  ObstructableLight
      some forms of light (e.g. directional- or point- light) may cause shadows
      class  PointLight
      a point light works like the light out of some street light
      class  SpecularLight
      specular light means the shining dot on polished surfaces
      Methods in fast3d.complex.light with parameters of type Light 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Illuminatable.revalidateLight(Light... lights)
      called when the renderable has to recalculate the visible in here (for asynchronous calls)

    • Uses of Light in fast3d.graphics

      Methods in fast3d.graphics with parameters of type Light 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Color Graphics3d.illuminateSurface(Illuminatable illum, Light... lights)
      does the lighting calculation for any given light and combines them to the visible color for the given surface
      Constructors in fast3d.graphics with parameters of type Light 
      Constructor and Description
      Graphics3d(java.awt.Graphics2D g, Shader sh, Light... lights)
      constructs a graphics3d-wrapper around a 2d-graphics-context with a shader to convert 3d in 2d
      Turtle3d(java.awt.Graphics2D g, Shader sh, Light... lights)
      calls super and locates the turtle at (0,0,0) with no rotation
